sources.title: Porky's Naughty Nephew (1938)
sources.description: At the Cartoon Animal's Outing, Porky's little nephew, Pinkie, bothers him so much that Porky enters the swim race to escape. Porky wins the race when Pinky's toy sailboat swimming after Porky turns out to be a real, hungry shark.

metadata.Plot: Porky and Pinky go to the beach. As Porky tries to nap, Pinky keeps whacking him with his little shovel. Then he fakes drowning in a shallow puddle. Porky enters a swim race, and Pinky sets a fake shark to follow him.
metadata.Actors: Mel Blanc, Bernice Hansen, Cliff Nazarro
